SA15pramanvu:pramanav_1.2_2: tenāyaṃ na paropakāra iti naścintāpi cetaściram sūktābhyāsavivardhitavyasanamityatrānubaddhaspṛham /
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_1.17_1: na yuktaṃ sādhanaṃ gotvād vāgādīnāṃ viṣāṇavat //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_1.24_1: asambaddhasya kiṃ sthāṇoḥ kāraṇatvaṃ na kalpyate //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_1.34_1: yaḥ pramāṇamasāviṣṭo na tu savasya vedakaḥ //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_1.35_0: dūraṃ paśyatu vā mā vā tattvamiṣṭaṃ tu paśyatu /
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_1.38_1: kimāsīt tasya yannāsti paśyād yena na sandhimat //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_1.39_0: na sa kaścit pṛthivyāderaṃśo yatra na jantavaḥ /
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_1.45_1: kramād bhavantī dhīḥ kāyāt kramaṃ tasyāpi śaṃsati //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_1.53_1: tadbhāvabhāvād vaśyatvāt prāṇāpānau tato na tat //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_1.55_0: tulyaḥ prasaṅgo 'pi tayoḥ na tulyaṃ cittakāraṇe /
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_1.60_1: āyuḥkṣayād vā doṣe tu kevale nāstyasādhyatā //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_1.61_1: vikārahetorvigame sa nocchavasiti sa nocchvasiti kiṃ punaḥ //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_1.63_0: avikṛtya hi yad vastu yaḥ padārtho vikāryate /
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_1.63_1: upādānaṃ na tat tasya yuktaṃ gogavayādivat //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_1.68_1: yathā jalāderādhāra iti cet tulyamatra ca //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_1.73_0: sthitimān nāśrayaḥ sarvaḥ sarvotpattai ca sāśrayaḥ /
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_1.73_1: tasmāt sarvasya bhāvasya na vināśaḥ kadācana //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_1.74_0: svayaṃ vinaśvarātmā cet tasya kaḥ sthāpakaḥ paraḥ /
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_1.74_1: svayaṃ na naśvarātmā cet tasya kaḥ sthāpakaḥ paraḥ //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_1.81_1: kālena vyajyate 'bhedāt syād dehe 'pi tato guṇaḥ //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_1.83_1: janmino yasya te na sto na sa janmādhigacchati //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_1.91_1: dṛśyaḥ saṃyoga iti cet kuto 'dṛśyāśraye gatiḥ //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_1.93_1: abhilāpācca bhedena rūpaṃ buddhau na bhāsate //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_1.95_1: sa eva sarvabhāveṣu hetuḥ ki neṣyate tayoḥ //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_1.103_0: ato na rūpaṃ ghaṭa ityekādhikararaṇa śrutiḥ /
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_1.110_0: kramavantaḥ kathaṃ te syuḥ kramavaddhetunā vinā /
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_1.113_1: na hi tat tasya kārya yad yasya bhedānnna bhidyate //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_1.120_0: śarīrād yadi tajjanma prasaṅgaḥ pūrvavad bhavet /
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_1.120_1: cittāccet tata evāstu janma dehāntarasya ca //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_1.122_1: svabhāvātikramo mā bhūditi ced āhitaḥ sa cet //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_1.123_1: viśeṣo naiva vardheta svabhāvaśca na tādṛśaḥ //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_1.127_0: tasmāt sa teṣāmutpannaḥ svabhāvo jāyate guṇaḥ /
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_1.132_0: tathā hi mūlamabhyāsaḥ pūrvaḥ pūrvaḥ parasya tu /
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_1.136_0: yatastathā sthite hetau nivṛttirne ti paśyati /
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_1.152_0: ādhipatyaṃ viśiṣṭānāṃ yadi tatra na karmaṇām /
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_1.153_0: na vikārād vikāreṇa sarveṣām na ca sarvajāḥ /
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_1.156_1: tenaikasyāṃ na tīvraḥ syād aṅga rūpādyapīti cet //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_1.158_1: yadavastho mato rāgī na dveṣī syācca tādṛśaḥ //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_1.166_0: jñānaṃ syāt kasyacit kiñcit kutaścit tena kiñcina /
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_1.168_1: yad rūpaṃ dṛśyatāṃ yātaṃ tad rūpaṃ prāṅ na dṛśyate //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_1.169_0: śatadhā viprakīrṇe 'pi hetau tad vidyate katham /
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_1.170_1: sarvaḥ samānarāgaḥ syād bhūtātiśayato na cet //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_1.183_0: tathā kāraṇametat syād iti kecit pracakṣate /
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_1.183_1: satyeva yasmin yajjanma vikāre vāpi vikriyā //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_1.184_0: tat tasya kāraṇaṃ prāhustat teṣāmapi vidyate /
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_1.187_0: yato 'pi prāṇinaḥ kāmavibhavecche ca ta mate /
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_1.190_0: imāṃ tu yuktimanvicchan vādhate svamataṃ svayam /
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_1.193_1: yāvaccātmani na premṇo hāniḥ sa paritasyati //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_1.198_1: mohaśca mūlaṃ doṣāṇāṃ sa ca sattvagraho vinā //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_1.199_0: tanādyahetau na dveṣo na doṣo 'taḥ kṛpā matā /
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_1.200_1: mandatvāt karuṇāyāśca na yatnaḥ sthāpane mahān //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_1.201_0: tiṣṭhantyeva parādhīnā yeṣāṃ tu mahatī kṛpā /
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_1.202_0: mārge cet sahajāhānerna hānau vā bhavaḥ kutaḥ /
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_1.202_1: sukhī bhaveyaṃ duḥkhī vā mā bhūvamiti tṛṣyataḥ //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_1.205_1: anityatvena yo 'vācyaḥ sa heturna hi kasyacit //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_1.206_1: nityaṃ tamāhurvidvāṃso yaḥ svabhāvo na naśyati //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_1.215_0: tanmūlāśca malāḥ sarve sa ca satkāyadarśanam /
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_1.223_1: snehaḥ sadoṣa iti cet tataḥ kiṃ tasya varjanam //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_1.224_0: adūṣite 'sya viṣaye na śakyaṃ tasya vajanam /
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_1.225_0: tayoradṛṣṭirviṣaye na tu bāhyeṣu yaḥ kramaḥ /
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_1.226_1: kā vā sadoṣatā dṛṣṭā snehe duḥkhasamāśrayaḥ //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_1.227_1: na tairvinā duḥkhaheturātmā cet te 'pi tādṛśāḥ //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_1.230_0: svatvadhīḥ kena vāryeta vairāgyaṃ tatra tat kutaḥ /
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_1.232_0: sa tathaiveti sā doṣadṛṣṭāvapi na hīyate /
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_1.233_1: na h yekāntena tad duḥkhaṃ bhūyasā saviṣānnavat //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_1.237_0: icchet prema katham premṇaḥ prakṛtirna hi tādṛśī /
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_1.241_0: pratyakṣaṃ pūrvamapi tat tathāpi na virāgavān /
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_1.244_0: etāvadeva ca jagat kvedānīṃ sa virajyate /
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_1.244_1: sadoṣatāpi cet tasya tatrātmanyapi sā samā //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_1.246_0: sa cendriyādau na tvevaṃ bālāderapi sambhavāt /
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_1.248_1: api cāsadguṇāropaḥ snehāt tatra hi dṛśyate //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_1.251_1: pratyutpannāt tu yo duḥkhānnirvedo dveṣa īdṛśaḥ //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_1.253_0: tasmin nivṛtte prakṛtiṃ svāmeva bhajate punaḥ /
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_1.255_0: sā ca naḥ pratyayotpattiḥ sā nairātmyadṛgāśrayaḥ /
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_1.257_1: ātmīyameva yo necched bhoktāpyasya na vidyate //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_1.258_0: ātmāpi na tadā tasya kriyābhogau hi lakṣaṇam /
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_1.262_0: mā bhūd gauravamevāsya na pāpaṃ gurvamūrttitaḥ /
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_1.266_0: dṛṣṭaṃ buddherna cānyasya santi tāni nayanti kim /
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_1.271_0: kṛrtṛ bhoktṛtvahāniḥ syāt sāmarthya ca na sidhyati /
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_1.276_1: dvayakṣayārtha yatne ca vyarthaḥ karmakṣaye śramaḥ //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_1.279_1: yadīṣṭamaparaṃ kleśāt tat tapaḥ kleśa eva cet //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_1.281_0: tajje karmaṇi śaktāḥ syuḥ kṛtihāniḥ kathaṃ bhavet /
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_1.281_1: doṣā na karmaṇo duṣṭaḥ karoti na viparyayāt //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_1.284_1: dayayā śreya ācaṣṭe jñānāt satyaṃ sasādhanam //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_2.4_1: dṛṣṭā śaktiḥ matā sā cet saṃvṛtyā astu yathā tathā //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_2.22_1: nityatvādapi kiṃ tasya kastāṃ kṣapayituṃ kṣamaḥ //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_2.23_1: nīlādyākāraleśo yaḥ sa tasmin kena nirmitaḥ //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_2.30_1: yanniṣṭhāsta ime śabdā na rūpaṃ tasya kiñcana //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_2.41_1: tathā dvirūpatāyāṃ vā tad vastvekaṃ kathaṃ bhavet //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_2.42_0: tābhyāṃ tadanyadeva syād yadi rūpaṃ samaṃ tayoḥ /
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_2.42_1: tayoriti na sambandho vyāvṛttistu na duṣyati //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_2.43_1: kārya cet tadanekaṃ syānnaścaraṃ ca na tanmatam //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_2.48_1: yadi nāmendriyāṇāṃ syād draṣṭā bhāseta tadvapuḥ //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_2.55_1: gatiścet pararūpeṇa na ca bhrānteḥ pramāṇatā //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_2.61_1: tasmāt sarvaḥ parokṣo 'rtho viśeṣeṇa na gamyate //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_2.62_0: yā ca sambandhino dharmād bhūtirdharmiṇi jñāyate /
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_2.70_1: tadvaśya tato jātaṃ tatsvabhāvo 'pi vā bhavet //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_2.71_0: svanimittāt svabhāvād vā vinā nārthasya sambhavaḥ /
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_2.72_1: anyeṣu satsvadṛśye ca satta vā tadvataḥ katham //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_2.81_0: yo hi bhāvo yathābhūto sa tadṛgliṅ gacetasaḥ /
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_2.84_1: nimittaṃ tatsvabhāvo vā kāraṇam tacca taddhiyaḥ //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_2.88_0: siddhaḥ kenāsahasthānāditi cet tat kuto matam /
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_2.90_1: prayogaḥ kevalaṃ bhinnaḥ sarvatrārtho na bhidyate //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_2.95_0: bhinno 'bhinno 'pi vā dharmaḥ sa viruddhaḥ prayujjate /
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_2.96_0: yathā vastveva vastūnāṃ sādhane sādhanaṃ matam /
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_2.100_1: tacca hetau svabhāve vā dṛśye dṛśyatā mate //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_2.102_0: nānyāsyānityatā bhāvāt pūrva siddhaḥ sa cenidriyāt /
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_2.112_1: ṣaṣṭhayādyayogāditi cedū antayoḥ sa kathaṃ bhavet //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_2.115_1: sā sattā sa ca sambandho nityau kāryamatheha kim //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_2.126_0: ekatra dṛṣṭau bhedo hi kvacinnānyatra dṛśyate /
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_2.128_1: viṣayo yaśca śabdānāṃ saṃyojyeta sa eva taiḥ //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_2.138_1: śuddhe manovikalpe ca na kramagrahaṇaṃ bhavet //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_2.140_1: cakrabhrāntiṃ dṛgādhatte na dṛśāṃ ghaṭanena sā //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_2.150_0: śṛṅgaṃ gavīti loke syāt śṛṃge gaurityalaukikam /
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_2.152_1: tantvākhyāṃ vartayet kārye darśayan nāśrayaṃ śruteḥ //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_2.154_0: anumānaṃ ca jātyādau vastuno nāsti bhedini /
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_2.155_1: geho yadyapi saṃyogastanmālā kinnu tad bhavet //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_2.163_0: vastūnāṃ vidyate tasmāt tanniṣṭhā vastuni śrutiḥ /
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_2.165_1: śabdāt tadapi nārthātmā bhrāntiḥ sā vāsanodbhavā //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_2.167_1: ākāraḥ sa ca nārthe 'sti taṃ vadannarthabhāk katham //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_2.169_1: śabdārtho 'rthaḥ sa eveti vacane na virudhyate //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_2.173_0: tasmād jātyāditadyogā nārthe teṣu ca na śrutiḥ /
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_2.180_1: siddhaṃ tatkena tasmin hi na pratyakṣaṃ na laiṅgikam //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_2.184_1: sarva tathaiva hetorhi bhedād bhedaḥ phalātmanām //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_2.186_1: anapekṣya na cecchaktaṃ syāt smṛtāveva liṃgavat //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_2.191_1: atha kasmād dvayādhīnajanma tat tena nocyate //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_2.194_0: sañcitaḥ samudāyaḥ sa sāmānyaṃ tatra cākṣadhīḥ /
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_2.200_0: nai kaṃ citrapataṃgādi rūpaṃ vā dṛśyate katham /
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_2.201_0: naikasvabhāvaṃ citraṃ hi maṇirūpaṃ yathaiva tat /
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_2.210_0: kiṃ syāt sā citrataikasyām na syāt tasyāṃ matāvapi /
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_2.210_1: yadīdaṃ svayamarthānāṃ rocate tatra ke vayam //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_2.213_1: tasmāt tadeva tasyāpi tattvaṃ yā dvayaśūnyatā //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_2.216_1: lakṣaṇaṃ sa ca tattvaṃ na tenāpyete vilakṣaṇāḥ //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_2.221_0: yad yathā bhāsate jñānaṃ tat tathaiva prakāśate /
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_2.223_0: ko vā virodho bahavaḥ sañjātātiśayāḥ pṛthak /
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_2.224_0: hetubhāvād ṛte nānyā grāhyatā nāma kācana /
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_2.225_0: kathaṃ vāvayavī grāhyā sakṛt svāvayavaiḥ saha /
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_2.247_0: bhinnakālaṃ kathaṃ grāhyamiti ced grāhyātāṃ viduḥ /
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_2.250_0: avedakāḥ parasyāpi te svarūpaṃ kathaṃ viduḥ /
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_2.252_1: dṛṣṭaṃ janma sukhādīnāṃ tat tulyaṃ manasāmapi //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_2.253_0: asatsu satsu caiteṣu na janmājanma vā kvacit /
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_2.253_1: dṛṣṭaṃ sukhāderbuddhervā tat tato nānyaśca te //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_2.255_1: multvā taṃ pratipadyeta sukhādīneva sā kathan //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_2.258_0: pṛthak pṛthak ca sāmarthye dvayornīlādivat sukham /
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_2.259_0: na hi saṃvedanaṃ yuktam arthenaiva saha grahe /
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_2.259_1: kiṃ sāmarthya sukhādīnāṃ neṣṭā dhīryat tadudbhavā //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_2.268_1: grāhyānāha na tasyāpi sakṛd yukto dvayagrahaḥ //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_2.271_1: sa idānīṃ kathaṃ bāhyāḥ sukhādyātmeti gamyate //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_2.272_1: agrāhakaḥ syāt sarvasya tato hīyeta bhoktṛtā //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_2.274_0: tasmāt ta āntarā eva saṃvedyatvācca cetanāḥ /
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_2.274_1: saṃvedanaṃ na yad rūpaṃ na hi tat tasya vedanam //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_2.281_0: prāguktaṃ yogināṃ jñānaṃ teṣāṃ tad bhāvanāmayam /
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_2.283_1: svapne 'pi smaryate smārta na ca tat tādṛgarthavat //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_2.286_0: tatra pramāṇaṃ saṃvādi yat prāṅ nirṇītavastuvat /
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_2.287_0: śabdārthagrāhi yad yatra tajjñānaṃ tatra kalpanā /
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_2.296_1: tat tulyaṃ vikriyāvaccet saiveyaṃ kiṃ niṣidhyate //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_2.299_0: suptasya jāgrato vāpi yaiva dhīḥ sphuṭabhāsinī /
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_2.301_1: sādhanaṃ na hi tasya sādhanaṃ yā kriyā yataḥ //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_2.307_0: sā ca tasyātmabhūtaiva tena nārthāntaraṃ phalam /
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_2.313_1: atādrū pye na bhedo 'pi tadvadanyadhiyo 'pi vā //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_2.314_1: ekārthatve dvayaṃ vyartha na ca syāt kramabhāvitā //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_2.316_1: dharmeḥ sa niyamo na syāt sambandhasyāviśeṣataḥ //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_2.320_1: tadarthavedanaṃ kena tādrū pyād vyabhicāri tat //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_2.321_1: sarūpayanti tat kena sthūlābhāsaṃ ca te 'ṇavaḥ //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_2.324_0: idaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ śrutaṃ vedam iti yatrāvasāyadhīḥ /
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_2.326_0: ātmā sa tasyānubhavaḥ s ca nānyasya kasyacit /
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_2.333_0: yadi bahyo 'nubhūyeta ko doṣo naiva kaścana /
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_2.342_0: yadi bāhyaṃ na vidyeta ksya saṃvedanaṃ bhavet /
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_2.342_1: yadyagatyā svarūpasya bāhyasyaiva na kiṃ matam //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_2.346_0: tasmāt prameye bāhye 'pi yuktaṃ svānubhavaḥ phalam /
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_2.349_1: tasmād buddhiniveśyārthaḥ sādhanaṃ tasya sā kriyā //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_2.350_0: yathā niviśate so 'rtho yataḥ sā prathate tathā /
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_2.356_1: dūre yathā vā maruṣu mahānalpo 'pi dṛśyate //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_2.360_0: bhāvā yena nirūpyante tadrūpaṃ nāsti tattvataḥ /
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_2.360_1: yasmādekamanekaṃ ca rūpaṃ teṣāṃ na vidyate //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_2.364_1: tādātmyādātmavit tasya sa tasya sādhanaṃ tataḥ //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_2.366_1: iti sā yogyatā mānamātmā meyaḥ phalaṃ svavit //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_2.367_1: sā yogyateti ca proktaṃ pramāṇaṃ svātmavedanam //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_2.370_1: viṣayatvaṃ tadaṃśena tadabhāve na tad bhavet //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_2.372_1: sā cānityā na jātiḥ syānnityā cā janikā katham //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_2.376_1: nityamātmani sambandhe pratīyāt kathitaṃ ca na //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_2.382_1: bhrāntyā saṅkalanaṃ jyotirmanaskāre ca sā bhavet //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_2.383_0: sarveṣāmapi kāryāṇāṃ kāraṇaiḥ syāt tathā grahaḥ /
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_2.392_1: niyamaṃ yadi na bru yāt pratyayāt samanantarāt //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_2.394_1: buddhīrāśritya kalpyeta yadi kiṃ vā virudhyate //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_2.395_0: anagnijanyo dhūmaḥ syāt tatkāryāt kāraṇe gatiḥ /
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_2.395_1: na syāt kāraṇatāyāṃ vā kuta ekāntato gatiḥ //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_2.398_0: astyeṣa viduṣāṃ vādo bāhyāṃ tvāśritya varṇyate /
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_2.402_0: tathā hyāśritya pitaraṃ tadrūpo 'pi sutaḥ pituḥ /
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_2.407_0: sa eva yadi dhīhetuḥ ki pradīpamapekṣate /
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_2.409_1: ālokana na mandena dṛśyate 'to bhidā yadi //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_2.412_0: mandaṃ tadapi tejaḥ kimāvṛteriha sā na kim /
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_2.415_1: arthānarthau na yena stastadadṛṣṭaṃ karoti kim //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_2.422_1: āhuḥ pratikṣaṇaṃ bhedaṃ sa doṣo 'trāpi pūrvavat //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_2.427_1: svaṃ ca rūpaṃ na sā vettītyutsanno 'nubhavo 'khilaḥ //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_2.430_0: yo yasya viṣayābhāsastaṃ vetti na tadipyapi /
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_2.430_2: buddhiḥ sarūpā tadviccet nedānīṃ vit sarūpikā //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_2.435_1: na ca kenacidaṃśena sarva sarvasya vedanam //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_2.443_1: dṛṣṭākhyā tatra cet siddhaṃ sārūpyesya svavedanam //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_2.444_0: athātmarūpaṃ no vetti pararūpasya vit katham /
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_2.446_1: tadārtho jñānamiti ca jñāte ceti gatā kathā //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_2.447_0: atha svarūpam sā tarhi svayameva prakāśate /
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_2.451_0: tajjā tatpratibhāsā va yadi dhīrvetti nāparā /
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_2.452_1: sā dhīrnirviṣayā prāptā sāmānyaṃ ca tadagrahe //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_2.453_0: na gṛhyat iti proktam na ca tadvastu kiñcana /
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_2.457_1: nodeti duḥkhamiti cet na vai duḥkhasamudbhavaḥ //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_2.459_0: bhāsamānaṃ svarūpeṇa pīḍā duḥkhaṃ svayaṃ yadā /
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_2.459_1: na tadālambanaṃ jñānaṃ na tadaivaṃ prayujyate //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_2.461_1: taccākṣamartho dhīḥ pūrvo manaskāro 'pi vā bhavet //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_2.463_0: tathārtho dhīmanaskārau jñānaṃ tau ca na sidhyataḥ /
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_2.464_0: liṅgaṃ saiva nanu jñānaṃ vyakto 'rtho 'nena varṇitaḥ /
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_2.466_1: sa ca jñāto 'tha vājñāto bhavejjñātasya liṅgatā //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_2.468_0: adṛṣṭadṛṣṭayo 'nyena draṣṭrā dṛṣṭā na hi kvacit /
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_2.470_1: tasya bhedaḥ kuto buddhe rvyabhicāryanyajaśca saḥ //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_2.475_1: ityarthasya dhiyaḥ siddhiḥ nārthāt tasyāḥ kathañcana //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_2.478_0: prakāśitā kathaṃ vā syāt buddhirbuddh yantareṇa vaḥ /
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_2.481_0: iti prakāśarūpā naḥ svayaṃ dhīḥ samprakāśate /
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_2.482_0: sādṛśye 'pi hi dhīranyā prakāśyā na tayā matā /
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_2.488_1: dhiyaḥ svayaṃ ca na sthānaṃ tadūrdhvaviṣayāsthiteḥ //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_2.489_0: sthāne svayaṃ na naśyet sā paścādapyaviśeṣataḥ /
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_2.491_1: na dīrghagrāhikā sā ca tanna syād dīrghadhīsmṛtiḥ //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_2.492_0: pṛthak pṛthak ca buddhīnāṃ saṃvittau taddhvaniśruteḥ /
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_2.492_1: avicchinnābhatā na syād ghaṭanaṃ ca nirākṛtam //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_2.496_1: buddhiśca kṣaṇikā tasmāt kramād varṇān prapadyate //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_2.501_0: bādhake sati sannyāye vicchinna iti tat kutaḥ /
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_2.501_1: buddhīnāṃ śaktiniyamāditi cet sa kuto bhataḥ //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_2.506_1: sa evāyamiti jñānaṃ nāsti tacchakṣaje kutaḥ //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_2.508_0: na hyarthābhāsi ca jñānamartho bāhyaśca kevalaḥ /
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_2.509_0: sūpalakṣeṇa bhedena yau saṃvittau na lakṣitau /
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_2.509_1: arthārthapratyayo paścāt smaryete tau pṛthak katham //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_2.511_1: na hi saṃvedanaṃ śuddhaṃ bhavedarthasya vedanam //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_2.512_0: tathā hi nīlādyākāra eka ekaṃ ca vedanam /
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_2.512_1: lakṣyate na tu nīlābhe vedane vedanaṃ param //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_2.513_1: dṛṣṭā tadvedanaṃ kena tasyāpyanyena ced imām //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_2.514_1: pūrvā dhīḥ saiva cenna syāt sañcāro viṣayāntare //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_2.516_0: ātmani jñānajanane svabhāve niyatāṃ ca tām /
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_2.517_0: bāhyāḥ sannihito 'pyarthastāṃ vibadhnan hi na prabhuḥ /
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_2.521_0: śaktikṣaye pūrvādhiyo na hi dhīḥ prāgdhiyā vinā /
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_2.526_0: ekaiva cet kriyaikaḥ syāt kiṃ dīpo 'nekadarśanaḥ /
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_2.527_1: niyamaḥ sa kutaḥ paścāt buddheścedastu sammatam //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_2.528_1: agrāhyaṃ na hi tejo 'sti na ca saukṣamyādyanaṃśake //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_2.533_1: rūpādi buddheḥ kiṃ jātaṃ paścād yat prāṅ na vidyate //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_2.534_1: cetaso grāhyatā saiva tato nārthāntare gatiḥ //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_2.537_0: artha pūrvañca vijñānaṃ gṛhṇīyad yadi dhīḥ parā /
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_3.17_0: na ca nāstīti vacanāt tannāstyeva yathā yadi /
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_3.17_1: nāsti sa khyāpyate nyāyastadā nāstīti gamyate //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_3.24_1: nāścavāniti martyena na bhāvyaṃ gomatāpi kim //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_3.27_1: khyāpyete viduṣāṃ vācyo hetureva hi kevalaḥ //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_3.33_0: arthāntaranimitto hi dharmaḥ syādanya eva saḥ /
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_3.34_1: tasyābhāve tu sa bhavan hetumatāṃ vilaṅghayet //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_3.42_0: tasmād viśeṣo yo yena dharmeṇa sampratīyate /
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_3.42_1: na da śakyastato 'nyena tena bhinnā vyavasthitiḥ //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_3.43_1: ko 'nyo bhāgo na dṛṣṭaḥ syād yaḥ pramāṇaiḥ parīkṣyate //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_3.45_0: tasmād dṛṣṭasya bhāvasya dṛṣṭa evākhilo guṇaḥ /
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_3.46_1: sarvagraho hyapohe tu nāyaṃ doṣaḥ prasajyate //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_3.50_1: tāvanta eva śabdāśca tena te bhinnagocarāḥ //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_3.51_1: buddh yā vā nānyavisaya iti paryāyatā bhavet //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_3.57_1: yanna niścīyate rūpaṃ tat teṣāṃ viṣayaḥ katham //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_3.63_0: jijñāpayiṣurartha taṃ taddhitena taṃ taddhitena kṛtāpi vā /
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_3.63_1: antena vā yadi brū yāt bhedo nāsti tataḥ paraḥ //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_3.64_1: pratyākhyātaṃ pṛthaktve hi syād doṣo jātitadvatoḥ //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_3.67_1: khasya svabhāvaḥ khatvaṃ cetyatra vā kiṃ nibandhanam //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_3.74_1: dṛṣṭā yathā vauṣadhayo nānātve 'pi na cāparāḥ //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_3.91_0: tadrū paṃ sarvato bhinnaṃ tathā tatpratipādikā /
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_3.91_1: na śrutiḥ kalpanā vāsti samānyenaiva vṛttitaḥ //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_3.92_1: tadā svalakṣaṇaṃ nāsti saṃketastena tatra na //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_3.96_1: ucyate tena tebhyo 'syāvyavacchede kathaṃ ca saḥ //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_3.98_0: jñānādyarthakriyāṃ tāṃ tāṃ dṛṣṭvā bhede 'pi kuvataḥ /
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_3.99_1: parasyāpi na sā buddhiḥ sāmānyādeva kevalāt //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_3.102_0: tadekaṃ vastu kiṃ tāsāṃ nānātvaṃ samapohati /
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_3.106_1: kārya ca tāsāṃ prāpto 'sau jananaṃ yadupakriyā //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_3.107_1: pratibhāso dhiyā bhinnaḥ samānā iti tadgrahāt //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_3.108_1: sādṛśyaṃ nanu dhīḥ kārya tāsāṃ sā ca vibhidyate //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_3.115_1: teṣāmavṛkṣāḥ saṃṅkete vyavacchinnā na vā yadi //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_3.122_0: taṃ tasyā pratiyatī dhīḥ bhrāntyaikaṃ vastvivekṣate /
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_3.124_1: niveśanaṃ ca yo yasmād bhidyate vinivartya tam //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_3.126_0: kaścid bhāga iti prokto rūpaṃ nāsyāpi kiñcina /
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_3.127_0: na tatra gamyate kaścid viśiṣṭaḥ kenacit paraḥ /
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_3.130_0: liṅgaṃ vā tatra vicchinnaṃ vācyaṃ vastu na kiñcana /
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_3.132_0: yadānyat tena sa vyāpta ekatvena ca bhāsate /
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_3.133_1: syāt satyaṃ sa hi tatreti naikavastvabhidhāyini //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_3.139_1: yad rūpaṃ śābaleyasya bāhuleyasya nāsti tat //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_3.140_1: arthābhedena ca vinā śabdābhedo na yujyate //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_3.147_0: tad vyaṅgyaṃ yogyatāyāśca kāraṇaṃ kārakaṃ matam /
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_3.147_1: prāgevāsya ca yogyatve tadapekṣā na yujyate //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_3.152_1: na yāti na ca tatrāsīdasti paścānna cāṃśavat //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_3.158_0: bhedānna hetuḥ karmāsya na jātiḥ karmasaṃśrayāt /
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_3.160_1: sāmānyaṃ pācakatvādi yadi prāgeva tad bhavet //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_3.162_1: tulye bhede yayā jāti pratyāsattyā prasarpati //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_3.165_0: ātmaikatrāpi vā so 'stīti vyarthāḥ syuḥ sahakāriṇaḥ /
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_3.167_0: sa ca nānveti yonveti na tasmāt kāryasambhavaḥ /
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_3.167_1: tenātmanāpi bhede hi hetuḥ kaścinna cāparaḥ //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_3.168_1: bhedo 'pi tena naivaṃ cet ya ekasmin vinaśyati //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_3.169_0: tiṣṭhatyātmā na tasyāto na syāt sāmānyabhedadhīḥ /
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_3.170_1: yat tasya janakaṃ rūpaṃ tato 'nyo janakaḥ katham //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_3.171_0: bhinnā viśeṣā janakāḥ astyabhedo 'pi teṣu cet /
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_3.174_1: bhede hi kārakaṃ kiñcid vastudharmatayā bhavet //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_3.176_0: paryāyeṇātha kartṛtvaṃ sa kiṃ tasyaiva vastunaḥ /
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_3.177_1: tayorapi bhaved bhedo yadi yenātmanā tayoḥ //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_3.180_1: cintyete svātmanā bhedo vyāvṛttyā ca samānatā //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_3.184_0: sa eva dadhi so 'nyatra nāstītyanubhayaṃ param /
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_3.184_1: sarvātmatve ca sarveṣāṃ bhinnau syātāṃ na dhīdhvanī //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_3.187_1: sattāsvabhāvo hetuścet sā sattā sādhyate katham //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_3.189_0: na kaścidarthaḥ siddhaḥ syādaniṣiddhaṃ ca tādṛśam /
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_3.190_0: sattāyāṃ tena sādhyāyāṃ viśeṣaḥ sādhito bhavet /
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_3.192_0: dharmo viruddho 'bhāvasya sā sattā sādhyate katham /
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_3.210_0: na sādhyaḥ samudāyaḥ syāt siddhau dharmaśca kevalaḥ /
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_3.211_0: vastveva cityate h yatra pratibaddhaḥ phalodayaḥ /
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_3.212_0: ṣaṇḍhasya rūpe vairūpye kāminyāḥ kiṃ parīkṣayā /
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_3.234_0: śabdeṣu yuktaḥ sambandhe nāyaṃ doṣo vikalpite /
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_3.237_0: vyañjakaiḥ svaiḥ kṛtaḥ ko 'rtho vyaktāstaiste yato matāḥ /
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_3.237_1: sambandhasya ca vastutve syād bhedād buddhicitratā //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_3.239_0: sad dravyaṃ syāt parādhīnaṃ sambandho 'nyasya vā katham /
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_3.242_1: anyo vā racito granthaḥ sampradāyād ṛte paraiḥ //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_3.248_1: anyāviśeṣād varṇānāṃ sādhane ki phalaṃ bhavet //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_3.251_1: sakṛcchrutau ca sarveṣā kālabhedo na yujyate //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_3.252_1: anityaṃ yatnasambhūtaṃ pauruṣeyaṃ kathaṃ na tat //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_3.256_0: indriyasya syāt saṃskāraḥ śrṛṇuyānnikhilaṃ ca tat /
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_3.257_1: dhvanathaḥ kevalaṃ tatra śrū yante cenna vācakāḥ //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_3.264_0: yathā dīpo 'nyathā vāpi ko viśeṣo 'sya kārakāt /
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_3.265_1: tadrū pāvaraṇānāṃ ca vyaktiste vigamo yadi //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_3.271_1: avināśāt sa evāsya vināśa iti cet katham //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_3.279_0: na tasya kiñcid bhavati na bhavatyeva kevalam /
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_3.280_1: apekṣyeta paraḥ kārya yadi vidyeta kiñcana //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_3.287_0: nityebhyo vastusāmarthyāt na hi janmāsti kasyacit /
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_3.291_1: anvayo vyatireko vā sattvaṃ vā sādhyadharmiṇi //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_3.293_0: sa evāsya sapakṣaḥ syāt sarvo heturatonvayī /
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_3.298_1: vyaktiśca buddhiḥ sā yasmāt sa phalairyadi yujjate //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_3.300_0: manojapo vā vyarthaḥ syācchabdo hi śrotragocaraḥ /
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_3.300_1: pāramparyeṇa tajjatvāt tadv yaktiḥ sāpi cenmatiḥ //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_3.302_1: ānupūrvyāmasatyāṃ syāt saro rasa iti śruto //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_3.303_0: na kāryabheda iti ced asti sā puruṣāśrayā /
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_3.304_0: jāyate tadupādhiḥ sa śru tyā samavasīyate /
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_3.306_1: anyadeva tato rūpaṃ tadvarṇānāṃ pade pade //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_3.310_1: ye 'pi tantravidaḥ kecid mantrān kāṃścana kuvaṃte //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_3.313_0: pramāṇābhaṃ yathārthāsti na hi śeṣavato gatiḥ /
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_3.313_1: artho 'yaṃ nāyamartho na iti śabdā vadanti na //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_3.315_0: tadvt puṃstve kathamapi jñānī kaścit katha na vaḥ /
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_3.319_0: na vedayati vado 'pi vedārthasya kuto gatiḥ /
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_3.320_0: khādet śvamāṃsamityeṣa nārtha ityatra kā pramā /
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_3.322_1: prasiddhiśca nṛṇāṃ vādaḥ pramāṇaṃ sa ca neṣyate //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_3.326_1: eṣa sthāṇurayaṃ mārga iti vaktīti kaścana //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_3.329_0: apauruṣeyai sā nāsti tasya saikārthatā kutaḥ /
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_3.330_0: saṃketaśca nirarthaḥ syād vyaktau ca niyamaḥ kutaḥ /
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_3.330_1: yatra svātantryamicchāyā niyamo nāma tatra kaḥ //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_3.334_0: ebnriyān viṣamaṃ hetuṃ bhāvānāṃ viṣamāṃ sthitim /
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_3.337_0: na hyokaṃ nāsti satyārtha puruṣe bahubhāṣīṇi /
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_3.337_1: nāyaṃ svabhāvaḥ kārya vā vastūnāṃ vaktari dhvaniḥ //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_4.4_0: tadāgamavataḥ siddhaṃ yadi kasya ka āgamaḥ /
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_4.6_1: yuktyā yayāgamo grāhyaḥ parasyāpi ca sā na kim //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_4.11_0: liṅgaṃ svabhāvaḥ kārya vā dṛśyādarśanameva vā /
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_4.20_0: antaraṅgaṃ tu sāmarthya triṣu rūpeṣu saṃsthitam /
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_4.24_0: sādhyoktiṃ vā pratijñāṃ sa vadan doṣairna yujyate /
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_4.27_1: asambaddhā tathā hyeṣa na nyāyya iti varṇitam //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_4.33_0: sādhanaṃ yadvivāde na nyastaṃ taccenna sādhyate /
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_4.36_1: na siddhena vināśena tadvataḥ sādhanād dhvaneḥ //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_4.41_1: sādhyaṃ yatastathā neṣṭaṃ sādhyo dharmo 'tra kevalaḥ //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_4.46_0: kaiścit prakaraṇairiccha bhavet sā gamyate ca taiḥ /
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_4.48_1: siddhaṃ tena susiddhaṃ tanna tadā śāstramīkṣyate //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_4.50_1: cikirṣoḥ sa hi kālaḥ syāt tadā śāstreṇa bādhanam //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_4.60_1: na hi tasyoktidoṣeṇa sa jātaḥ śāstrabādhanaḥ //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_4.64_0: sarvānarthān samīkṛtya vaktuṃ śakyaṃ na sādhanam /
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_4.66_1: asabhbadde 'pi bādhā cet syāt sarva sarvabādhanam //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_4.74_1: kiñcidanyaṃ satu punargrahītuṃ labhate na kim //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_4.80_1: ihaivaṃ na hyanukte 'pi kiñcit pakṣe virudhyate //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_4.81_0: kuryācced dharmiṇaṃ sādhyaṃ tataḥ kiṃ tanna śaktyate /
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_4.98_1: na bādhā pratibandhaḥ syāt tulyakakṣatayā tayoḥ //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_4.99_1: tayoḥ pramāṇaṃ yasyāsti tat syādanyasya bādhakam //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_4.104_1: bādhakam yadi necchet sa bādhakaṃ kiṃ punarbhavet //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_4.108_0: śāstraṃ yatsiddhayā yuktyā svavācā ca na bādhyate /
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_4.118_0: atha vā bru vato lokasyānumābhāva ucyate /
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_4.120_0: candratāṃ śaśino 'nicchan kāṃ pratītiṃ sa vāñchati /
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_4.121_1: lakṣaṇatvāt tathā vṛkṣo dhātrītyuktau ca bādhanāt //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_4.123_0: yadi tasya kvacit sidhyet siddhaṃ vastubalena tat /
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_4.147_1: bādhyo na kevalo nānyasaṃśrayo veti sūcitam //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_4.157_1: tasya krameṇaṃ saṃyukte pāṃśurāśau sakṛd yute //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_4.158_0: bhedaḥ syād gaurave tasmāt pṛthak saha ca tolite /
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_4.164_1: tathā paraṃ prati nyastaṃ sādhyaṃ neṣṭaṃ tadāpi tat //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_4.167_0: sarvasya cāprasiddhatvāt kathañcit tena na kṣamāḥ /
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_4.172_1: byarthā vyaptiphalā soktiḥ sāmarthyād gamyate tataḥ //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_4.176_1: na tadvyāptiḥ phalaṃ vā kiṃ sāmānyenānuvartane //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_4.178_0: sa ca bhedāpratikṣepāt sāmānyānāṃ na vidyate /
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_4.178_1: vṛkṣo na śiṃśapaiveti yathā prakaraṇe kvacit //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_4.192_1: pārtho dhanurdharo nīlaṃ sarojamiti vā yathā //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_4.197_0: prayatnānantaraṃ jñānaṃ prāk sato niyamena na /
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_4.199_1: kāryeṇa saha nirdeśe mā jñāsīt sarvamīdṛśam //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_4.200_1: atra prabheda ākhyātaḥ lakṣaṇaṃ tu na bhidyate //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_4.203_1: na te hetava ityuktaṃ vyabhicārasya sambhavāt //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_4.204_0: sati vā pratibandhe 'stu sa eva gatisādhanaḥ /
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_4.206_0: svātmatve hetubhāve vā siddhe hi vyatirekitā /
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_4.213_1: dehe 'pi yadyasau na syād yukto dehe na sambhavaḥ //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_4.214_0: bhinne 'pi kiñcit sādharmyād yadi tattvaṃ pratīyate /
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_4.215_1: bhāvābhāvavyavasthāṃ kaḥ kartu tena vinā prabhuḥ //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_4.218_1: na tasya vyabhicāritvād vyatireke 'pi cet katham //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_4.222_1: neti saiva nivṛttiḥ kiṃ nivṛtterasato matā //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_4.224_1: sāpi na pratiṣedho 'yaṃ nivṛttiḥ kiṃ niṣidhyate //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_4.225_0: vidhānaṃ pratiṣedhaṃ ca muktvā śābdo 'sti nāparaḥ /
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_4.225_1: vyavahāraḥ sa cāsatsu neti prāptātra mūkatā //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_4.226_0: satāṃ ca na niṣedho 'sti so 'satsu ca na vidyate /
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_4.227_1: na thā na yathā so 'sti tathāpi na niṣidhyate //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_4.229_0: tābhyāṃ sa dharmi sambaddhaḥ khyātyabhavo 'pi tādṛśaḥ /
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_4.245_1: nivarttakaḥ sa evātaḥ pravṛttau ca pravartakaḥ //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_4.248_1: tairvinā bhavato 'nyasmāt tajjaṃ rūpaṃ kathaṃ bhavet //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_4.251_0: tat tasyā jananaṃ rūpamanyasya yadi saiva sā /
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_4.251_1: na tasyā jananaṃ rūpaṃ tadasyāḥ sambhavet katham //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_4.252_1: tasmāt svadṛṣṭāviva tad dṛṣṭe kārye 'pi gamyate //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_4.253_1: dravaśakteḥ yataḥ kledaḥ sā tvekaiva dvayorapi //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_4.278_0: tasyāḥ svayaṃ prayogeṣu svarūpaṃ vā prayujyate /
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_4.281_1: tameva naśvaraṃ bhāvaṃ janayed yadi kiṃ bhavet //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_4.282_0: ātmopakārakaḥ kaḥ syāt tasya siddhatmanaḥ sataḥ /
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_4.282_1: nātmopakārakaḥ kaḥ syāt tena yaḥ samapekṣyate //
SA15pramanvu:pramanav_4.284_1: bhāvo hi sa tathā bhūto 'bhāva bhāvastathā katham //
